page.title: 09TIBBERTON SCHOOLCHILDS DAY 1
page.content: {LIFE STYLES } {BEFORE SCHOOL}-A typical day begins for most children when the alarm rings at 7 am when they got out of bed they would brush their teeth and wash themselves and then go to breakfast which would be cereal.After breakfast it would be time to get ready for school.At 8.45 most children left their house to go to school,by car or by foot depending on the weather. {SCHOOL}-On arrival at school all the children waited outside in the playground until a teacher rang the bell to say that it was time to come in.As soon as they got into the classroom the register was taken to see if anyone was absent.Sometimes they went to assembly but other times they would stay in their classroom until they were to start lessons.Before break in the morning,
